title: Live your best life with us! All bills paid & fully furnished!
posting_body: ['At every Budget Suites you will find the same valuable services at a price you can value just as much.', 'Our famous budget friendly prices include:', 'Included Amenities:', '• Fully Furnished Apartments', '• Rent Payable Weekly or Monthly', '• All Utilities Included', '• Free Premium Cable TV', '- HBO and ESPN (Arizona and Texas locations)', '- Showtime and ESPN (Nevada locations)', '• Wifi available at most locations', '• Free Phone for Local Calls and Voicemail', '• Private Bedrooms', '• Full Size Kitchens and Appliances', 'Including: Stove, Refrigerator, Oven, and more', '• Newly remodeled Laundry Rooms with brand new Washers and Dryers', '• Offices Open 7 Days a Week', '• On-site Covered Parking (most Arizona and Nevada locations)', '• Resort Style Pools and Spas', '• On-site Maintenance', '• On-site Property Management', '• Complimentary Parking', '• Courtesy Patrol 7 Days a Week', 'Upgrades:', '• Deluxe Flooring', '• High Speed Internet', '• Flat Screen TV', '• Microwave']
